title: Hitman – Fast or Small?
body:
Hello,

Out of curiosity I’ve made two repacks of the latest Hitman GotY build. One of them is 20.6 GB in size, but installs relatively slow (from ~40 minutes on SSD to ~2 hours on HDD) and the other one is 22.7 GB, but installs 15-30 minutes tops on HDD.

I’m not gonna release both of them, so you gotta side with just one. Note, the decision is still up to me, but I will consider the poll results.
